products.title: Voile White Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile range of fabrics create a natural feature of the rooms natural light, and are fantatic at creating some privacy without sacrificing light. This soft cotton white coloured screen fabric, in its uplifitng shade and clean finish, creates a centre point of your window. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this white blind is not only made by their expert team in the heart of yorkshire, but comes with customer-first service and guarantees.

products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant coating makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Antiviral Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: Cool, creamy and bright, this clean and simple off-white roller blind will diffuse the light coming into your space for a light, but private, glow. The clue to its real strength is in its name though, an innovative antiviral additive that helps to prevent viruses - along wit cool, creamy and bright, this clean and simple off-white roller blind will diffuse the light coming into your space for a light, but private, glow.

products.title: Zeff Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: A very effective design which will catch any eye. With the use of matt and sheen threads to create a textured looking basket weave design. Available in other colours. The zeff cotton roller blind is a patterned white blind. Orders over 145 come with free delivery. You can also order a free sample. Nationwide coverage.

products.title: Marlow Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: Using matt and sheen threads to create a basket weave pattern across this blackout fabric. Available in other colours. Marlow cotton roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cotton - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cotton is a subtle shade of white that provides a clean yet discreet look to any window. The sturdy, durable fabric is also flexible and smooth, making for a high quality, easily usable blackout blind. Team the cotton with soft pastels and light woods for a light and airy kitchen, or with heavy greys and blacks for an industrial-look living room. You might even use it in the bedroom, where it would sit pretty amongst florals and checks.

products.title: Kerry Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: We love their neutral tones here, and there is no blind more neutral than the kerry cotton. The gorgeous and flawless cream tones are wonderfully flexible, complementing almost any scheme, whether it is full of brash blues and reds or more earthier browns and greens. Try throwing it in a room with wood furnishings or panelling and get a charming rustic flavour, or dont, im a website not your decorator.
